words.source: H3588 conj. כִּי 'when, if, because'; KJV 'when', ESV 'when', NASB 'when'
H1696 Piel impf. 3ms of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'shall speak', ESV 'says', NASB 'speaks'
H413 prep. + 2mp suff. 'to you'; KJV 'unto you', ESV 'to you', NASB 'to you'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'saying', ESV (omitted), NASB 'saying'
H5414 Qal imv. 2mp of נָתַן 'to give'; KJV 'shew', ESV 'prove', NASB 'work'
prep. l- + 2mp suff. 'for yourselves'; KJV 'for you', ESV 'yourselves', NASB (implied)
H4159 n.ms מוֹפֵת 'wonder, sign, portent'; KJV 'a miracle', ESV 'a miracle', NASB 'a miracle'
H559 conj. + Qal perf. 2ms of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'thou shalt say', ESV 'you shall say', NASB 'you shall say'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H175 proper name; all trans. agree
H3947 Qal imv. 2ms of לָקַח 'to take'; KJV 'take', ESV 'take', NASB 'take'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H4294 n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. מַטֶּה 'staff, rod'; KJV 'thy rod', ESV 'your staff', NASB 'your staff'
H7993 conj. + Hiphil imv. 2ms of שָׁלַךְ 'to throw, cast'; KJV 'and cast it', ESV 'and cast it', NASB 'and throw it'
H6440 prep. l- + n.mp constr. פָּנִים 'face'; KJV 'before', ESV 'before', NASB 'before'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H1961 Qal jussive 3ms of הָיָה 'to be'; KJV 'it shall become', ESV 'let it become', NASB 'it will become'
H8577 prep. l- + n.ms תַּנִּין 'serpent, dragon'; KJV 'a serpent', ESV 'a serpent', NASB 'a serpent'
